ygData.subject: Re: Looks like I'll be resigning.
ygData.msgSnippet: That wasn t written by me. Someone else got access to my e-mail and wrote it. don t think i would write something that stupid. -Sloop
ygData.messageBody:
That wasn't written by me. Someone else got access to my e-mail and
wrote it. don't think i would write something that stupid.
-Sloop

"Mike T. Hayashi" wrote:

> dun dun duh ! what a weirdo.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Clay Hirschkron
> To: league-of-swords@onelist.com ; eqenchanters@onelist.com
> ; brizells_fennin_ro@onelist.com
> Sent: Saturday, April 24, 1999 4:14 AM
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Looks like I'll be resigning.
> I have come to my senses and realized I should actually go
> out and get a life, instead of being obsessed with some
> stupid computer game. My advice is that all of you do too.
> I'm unsubscribing from all EverQuest lists. Farewell, fools.
>
